data.name: Skytalks XII at DEF CON
data.description: Remember when going to a security conference meant that you were going to sit around in a large room with 30 or so people watching presentations about subjects that contained highly sensitive information that usually was presented with some type of a legal disclosure? Yeah, some of you weren’t even…

relatedRecords.name: AFUP Day 2020 Lyon
relatedRecords.description: L’AFUP Day 2019 annonçait sold-out plus de 4 mois avant l’événement : l’engouement autour de ce nouvel événement a pris de court autant nos visiteuses et nos visiteurs que nos équipes d’organisation !

relatedRecords.name: FOSSCON India 2019
relatedRecords.description: FOSSCON INDIA 2019, Home,GIT, Belagavi, a platform to showcase your skills in all aspects of technology. The projects done using any of the open source software can be showcased. grab the chance to be a part of the wonderful event.
